fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Control a player into another. If they are control immune, redirect them. If they're also redirect immune, attack them out of anger.
- **Insatiable Control** - Select a player. Permanently gain the ability to use their ability. When you use their ability, you will also automatically roleblock them. If they die at night, automatically attack their killer. If they die at day, automatically kill the last person to vote them. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will learn the outcome of the abilities of everyone you've previously targeted.
- Insatiable Control will fail if your target only has limited use abilities.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Devolve the town into sin and chaos, eviscerate all who would try to banish you or Satan.
